title: Blackfoot (1890) Matthew
description: Blackfoot translation of the Book of Matthew by Rev. John Williams Tims in 1890 for the British and Foreign Bible Society. Blackfoot is a language spoken by the Blackfoot Tribe of North America.
provider: The British and Foreign Bible Society

language.name: Blackfoot
language.area: South Alberta, Blackfoot, Piegan, and Blood Reserves. Also in United States.
